fzf-picker.general.useGitIgnoreExcludes.markdownDescription: Use `.gitignore` entries (if present) to limit search paths

fzf-picker.general.useWorkspaceSearchExc.markdownDescription: In order to speed up VS Code's native search functionality, you can use the `search.exclude` setting. If checked, this extension will honor the same exclude patterns (as long as they follow the standard "gitignore glob style" that `rg` uses.

fzf-picker.general.additionalSearchLocat.markdownDescription: When to search the files listed in `general.searchLocations`
enumDescriptions: Never search these locations (setting useful for individual workspace overrides)
Only when no workspace is open

fzf-picker.general.searchWorkspaceFolder.markdownDescription: Search the folders defined in the workspace

enumDescriptions: Only search the working directory when no workspace is open

fzf-picker.general.batTheme.markdownDescription: The color theme to use for `bat` (see `bat --list-themes`)

fzf-picker.general.openFileInPreviewEdit.markdownDescription: When set to `true` files open in a Preview Editor. Use in conjunction with the `workbench.editor.enablePreivew` setting.

fzf-picker.findFiles.showPreview.markdownDescription: Show a preview window when searching files

fzf-picker.findFiles.previewCommand.markdownDescription: When populated: Used by `fzf` to produce the preview. Use `{}` to indicate the filename. Example: `bat {}`.

fzf-picker.findFiles.previewWindowConfig.markdownDescription: When populated: Used by `fzf` to determine position and look of the preview window. See the `fzf` documentation. Example for a horizontal split: `top,50%`.

fzf-picker.findWithinFiles.showPreview.markdownDescription: Show a preview window when searching within files

fzf-picker.findWithinFiles.previewComman.markdownDescription: When populated: Used by `fzf` to produce the preview when searching within files. Use `{1}` to indicate the filename, `{2}` for the line number. Example using `cat` and `awk` instead of `bat`: `cat {1} | awk '{if (NR>={2}) print}'`.

fzf-picker.findWithinFiles.previewWindow.markdownDescription: When populated: Used by `fzf` to determine position and look of the preview window. See the `fzf` documentation. Example for a horizontal split: `top,50%,border-bottom,+{2}+3/3,~3`.

fzf-picker.findWithinFiles.fuzzRipgrepQu.markdownDescription: By default, matching in "Find Within Files" is exact. Enabling this option relaxes the matching by slightly fuzzing the query that is sent to `rg`: it treats whitespaces as wildcards (`.*`). For example, when enabled, the query `function bar` will match `function foobar`. Otherwise, it won't. This setting does not work on Windows at the moment.

fzf-picker.advanced.useEditorSelectionAs.markdownDescription: By default, if you have an active editor with a text selection, we'll use that to populate the prompt in `fzf` such that it will start filtering text directly. Uncheck to disable.

fzf-picker.general.restoreFocusTerminal.markdownDescription: When enabled, the extension will restore focus to the previously active terminal after executing a command. This is useful if you frequently switch between the terminal and other parts of VS Code. Note: due to limitations in VS Code, will not focus other panel tabs such as problems/output/etc.

fzf-picker.general.useTerminalInEditor.markdownDescription: When enabled, the extension will create the terminal in the main editor stage.

fzf-picker.general.shellPathForTerminal.markdownDescription: Set the path for the shell (terminal type) to be used.

fzf-picker.pickFileFromGitStatus.showPre.markdownDescription: Show a preview window when picking a file from git status

fzf-picker.pickFileFromGitStatus.preview.markdownDescription: When populated: Used by `fzf` to produce the preview when picking a file from git status. Use `{}` to indicate the filename. Example: `git diff --color=always -- {}`.
When populated: Used by `fzf` to determine position and look of the preview window when picking a file from git status. See the `fzf` documentation. Example: `right:50%:border-left`.

fzf-picker.findTodoFixme.previewEnabled.description: Enable preview for TODO/FIXME search results

fzf-picker.findTodoFixme.previewCommand.description: Preview command for TODO/FIXME search results

fzf-picker.findTodoFixme.previewWindowCo.description: Preview window configuration for TODO/FIXME search results

fzf-picker.findTodoFixme.searchPattern.description: Regular expression pattern for searching TODO/FIXME/HACK comments. Matches keywords followed by a colon and optional space.

command.description: Command to execute for the custom task

fzf-picker.customTasks.description: Custom tasks that can be executed by the extension

fzf-picker.general.openCommand.description: CLI command to open files. Use 'code' for VS Code, 'cursor' for Cursor, or any other custom command.
